text: Leavenworth Federal Penitentiary is the oldest Federal prison in the USA. It's located in Leavenworth, Kansas. It was built to test out a new prison regime and penal ideology reliant on stringent rules and order. Category:Prisons in the United States Category:Leavenworth County, Kansas Category:Buildings and structures in Kansas
title: United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth
